word:
Be Strong, and of Good Courage. 

                                 "Elmshaven," Sanitarium, Cal. 
                                             July 27, 1903. 

Dear Brother Magan:-- 
     I received your letter two or three days ago. I have also received letters from several others, among them one from a Brother Howard of Washington, in regard to the color line. I have been kept very busy answering these letters.
